name: Angels Watching Over Me
lyric:
Angels watching over me

All night all day

Angels watching over me
My lord

All night all day

Angels watching over me

Sun is a setting in the west

Angels watching over me my lord

Sleep my child take your rest

Angels watching over me

All night all day

Angels watching over me my lord

All night all day

Angels watching over me

Baa baa black sheep

Baa baa black sheep have you any wool

Yes sir yes sir three bags full

One for the master

One for the dame

And one for the little boy
Who lives down the lane

Baa baa black sheep

Have you any wool

Yes sir yes sir

Three bags full

comments.brief:
这是歌词朗读 不是歌

来自iPhone客户端
